title: How to Be Good at the Game Winging It

steps.headline: Notice that you will start on a car or truck.
steps.description: Look around where you can see. Find if any bees or a crow (bird) is approaching. If there is a swarm of bees or a crow, wait until they pass by. Don't fly at them. You will lose all your energy and fall. You might fall to the ground, or you might have luck to land on a vehicle.

steps.headline: Keep flying until you get a little low.
steps.description: If you are way too low, you crash down! If bees or a crow come, try to land on a vehicle. (You do this by clicking once.) Proceed to the next step if none of this happens.

steps.headline: Land on a vehicle.
steps.description: Do this by clicking once. If you are very sure you won't crash without manual landing, don't click anything. You will land on a car and get a "Like a Boss." It's that or crashing.

steps.headline: You have started flying.
steps.description: Now click to land and click again to fly up.

steps.headline: Do the same thing until bees or a crow come.
Bees/crow came!
steps.description: Stop clicking and land on a vehicle. If that doesn't work, you wait. You might fall or live. If you stop and you fly up, you might live. If you stop and you land, you might crash.

steps.headline: Repeat.
steps.description: Know that this kind of flying is risky. You can crash a lot. Your mouse can be broken. Don't do it so much.

steps.headline: Land immediately on the next car from the car you are on.
Repeat.
steps.description: You might not want to do this in Story Mode. You'll lose time.

steps.headline: Be on the lookout for energy.
steps.description: They look like soda cans floating in the sky. They aren't dangerous. You can grab them to have more energy. If you do Method 2, you really need to get energy.

steps.headline: Land on a vehicle.
steps.description: If you are losing lots of energy, land immediately.

steps.headline: Wait for are very tiny bit of time for your energy to refuel.
steps.description: Don't worry if you are in Story Mode. Refueling energy is super quick.

steps.headline: Repeat.
steps.description: If your energy is wasted, you fall.

steps.headline: Be on the look out for rockets.
If you see a rocket, try to get it!
steps.description: You might not see one. If not, land and try again.

steps.headline: Relax for a little bit.
steps.description: You won't have to control anything when the rocket is used.

text: "Flying Safely" Notice that you will start on a car or truck. Look around where you can see. Find if any bees or a crow (bird) is approaching. If there is a swarm of bees or a crow, wait until they pass by. Don't fly at them. You will lose all your energy and fall. You might fall to the ground, or you might have luck to land on a vehicle. Click your mouse. You will fly immediately. Keep flying until you get a little low. If you are way too low, you crash down! If bees or a crow come, try to land on a vehicle. (You do this by clicking once.) Proceed to the next step if none of this happens. Land on a vehicle. Do this by clicking once. If you are very sure you won't crash without manual landing, don't click anything. You will land on a car and get a "Like a Boss." It's that or crashing. Repeat.  "Flying Far" Read steps 1-2 on Method 1.  Do those steps you read.  You have started flying. Now click to land and click again to fly up. Do the same thing until bees or a crow come.  Bees/crow came! Stop clicking and land on a vehicle. If that doesn't work, you wait. You might fall or live. If you stop and you fly up, you might live. If you stop and you land, you might crash. Repeat. Know that this kind of flying is risky. You can crash a lot. Your mouse can be broken. Don't do it so much. "Hopping" Read steps 1-2 on Method 1. Do it. Land immediately on the next car from the car you are on.  Repeat. You might not want to do this in Story Mode. You'll lose time. "Energy" Read steps 1-2 from Method 1. Do it. Be on the lookout for energy. They look like soda cans floating in the sky. They aren't dangerous. You can grab them to have more energy. If you do Method 2, you really need to get energy. Land on a vehicle. If you are losing lots of energy, land immediately. Wait for are very tiny bit of time for your energy to refuel. Don't worry if you are in Story Mode. Refueling energy is super quick. Repeat. If your energy is wasted, you fall. "Rocket Boosts" Again, read steps 1-2 on Method 1.  Be on the look out for rockets.  If you see a rocket, try to get it! You might not see one. If not, land and try again. Relax for a little bit. You won't have to control anything when the rocket is used. The rocket stops. Land when you have to.
